title: Healing Potion
summaries: The Healing Potion is a healing item that restores 100 health when used.

In addition to being crafted, Healing Potions can be found naturally in pots after Hardmode activation and pots in the Underworld before Hardmode. Several are also dropped by the Wall of Flesh and Skeletron.
It is the second tier of healing potions, the first being the Lesser Healing Potion, the third being the Greater Healing Potion and the fourth being the Super Healing Potion.
